import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; return (

{creatingProfile ? 'Create Your Profile' : 'Edit Your Profile'}

{creatingProfile ? ` Let's get some information to make your` : ' Add some changes to your profile'}

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
